property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionURL
property.description: Enter your Hive Metastore Connection URL, for example if MySQL: jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/mysql?createDatabaseIfNotExist=true

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionUserName
property.description: Enter your Hive Metastore database user name.

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionPassword
property.description: Enter your Hive Metastore database password.

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionDriverName
property.description: Enter your Hive Metastore Connection Driver Name, for example if MySQL: com.mysql.jdbc.Driver

property.name: hive.metastore.uris
property.description: IP address (or fully-qualified domain name) and port of the metastore host
